Featured-image: JC4090-off-white-illusion-v-neck-long-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A Grecian look with slightly pleated straps that cover the bust and creating a V-shape in the back. The sheer bodice overlay is dazzling with jewels and has a bursting of sparkle that leads from the waist to the neckline and back. A metal belt completes the classical look.
